text.section: The College of Agriculture of the University of Kentucky shall constitute the Agricultural Experiment Station.
The experiment station shall operate and direct the substations at Quicksand and Princeton which shall be divisions of the experiment station.
The experiment station may purchase, lease or accept gift of farms for use in its experimentation program.

law.history: Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 107, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1954. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1822-1, 4636f-3, 4636f-6.
